attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent high number of eastern european workers to our shores that have been able to find gainful employment without any major difficulty has surely proved that it is time the UK government clamped down on the Long Term unemployed that have no desire to find work just as long as the handouts are provided. Why should the workers contribute any tax money for this purpose to those who abuse the system. Six months is long enough. It is time for the workers to wake up.
